channel.title: C++
channel.description:
Can anyone recommend me a good website to learn C++, but really step for step from zero, As good explained as possible, since English isn't my native and programming always brings complicated words in their explanations :p
And what program like eclipse for java, would I use for C++, compiler ect I don't even know the extensions of C++ files lulz
I want to learn the basics a bit
thanks :D

item.title: C++
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:6, topic:430867”]>implying books can’t be in pdf format

implying pdf files aren’t shareable

I use:
http://www.cplusplus.com/
http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp
for references.

in the above:
http://www.cplusplus.com/doc/tutorial/

have fun.[/quote]
thank you

Read full topic

item.title: C++
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote="_s, post:4, topic:430867"][quote author=RandQm link=topic=533546.msg3900346#msg3900346 date=1327706982]

.cpp
.cc
.cxx
.c++ (not recommended)
.C (not recommended)

And what program like eclipse for java, would I use for C++, compiler ect

clang, gcc, vc++

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C%2B%2B
http://www.amazon.com/Programming-Language-3rd-Bjarne-Stroustrup/dp/0201889544

I’m looking for a website that offers tutorials with explanation actually, not a book, I can’t learn from books
[/quote]yes you can[/quote]

No I can’t never could,

  • book costs money + extra monezz for shipping && me == poor

Read full topic

item.title: C++
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:3, topic:430867”][quote author=lemme_winks_ link=topic=533546.msg3900330#msg3900330 date=1327705946]
.cpp
.cc
.cxx
.c++ (not recommended)
.C (not recommended)

And what program like eclipse for java, would I use for C++, compiler ect

clang, gcc, vc++

en.wikipedia.org

C++

C++ (/ˌsiːˌplʌsˈplʌs/ "cee plus plus") is a general-purpose programming language. It has imperative, object-oriented and generic programming features, while also providing facilities for low-level memory manipulation. It was designed with a bias toward system programming and embedded, resource-constrained and large systems, with performance, efficiency and flexibility of use as its design highlights. C++ has also been found useful in many other contexts, with key strengths being software infrastr...


amazon.com

The C++ Programming Language: Special Edition (3rd Edition)

Bjarne Stroustrup

More than three-quarters of a million programmers have benefited from this book in all of its editions Written by Bjarne Stroustrup, the creator of C++, this is the world's most trusted and widely rea ...

4.3 out of 5 stars, ISBN: 978-0201700732, Addison-Wesley Professional, February 11, 2000, $67.47


[/quote]

I’m looking for a website that offers tutorials with explanation actually, not a book, I can’t learn from books[/quote]yes you can

Read full topic
